Title: Relates to the effectiveness of chapter 565 of the laws of 2022 amending the state finance law relating to preferred source status for entities that provide employment to certain persons
Summary: Makes permanent provisions relating to preferred source status for entities that provide employment to certain persons.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 565 of the laws of 2022 amending the state finance law relating to preferred source status for entities that provide employment to certain persons, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
